description: A general and a new character in the sequel, Shin Koihime Musou. A cunning warrior who infiltrates Sousou`s forces on a pretense of defection during a major naval battle (based on the Chi Bi`s Battle) and sets the Gi faction`s ships on fire. If Kazuto joins the Gi Faction, Kougai is eventually killed for these actions.
name: Kougai Koufuku
